alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clay; Cloud; Jackson; Marshall; Nemaha; Ottawa; Pottawatomie; Republic; Riley; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 12:33PM CST until January 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Kansas. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight CST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight tonight to 11 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold wind chills Saturday through Sunday morning could be dangerous for vulnerable populations and those that may become stranded in their vehicles.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Cover all exposed skin. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Clay; Cloud; Jackson; Marshall; Nemaha; Ottawa; Pottawatomie; Republic; Riley; Washington
